title: Should I let my son “15 year old” buy panties? - Quora

response.answer_text: If you know that he is wearing panties and especially if he has been wearing your panties, then , yes, i would encourage him to buy his own rather than “borrowing” yours or other women’s panties. It is not uncommon for young men to wear panties and use hem to pleasure themselves. I did it when i was a young teen and I have worn panties off and of now for many years. There is a good probability that his behavior will continue. If he has problems buying panties for himself, I would suggest that perhaps you can help him by taking him shopping and getting him a few pairs. It is also a great opportunity for you to exercise a little control and insist that he only wear his panties at home and that he keeps it a secret from his schoolmates. If they found out, they could be awfully cruel to him. Secrets don’t keep long in school.

Yup yup you should in fact you should buy him some, it’s an extremely overwhelming urge that certain people get, and it only becomes more of an obsession the more the teen is denied the chance to wear panties, you buying panties for him will help keep him from not only believing his parents don’t accept him as he is which he will believe but it will also keep him from feeling so desperate to wear panties that he does something stupid and wrong like steal them from you or a sister or other relatives, just buy the boy some panties, trust me my parents tried to “keep me from being gay” which I never was even a little all they did was hurt me emotionally, and I mean permanently scarred me, and my trust in them. It took me a long time to get myself off the self destructive path that set me down.
